  • Constructor Details

    • Machine

      public Machine​(String name, int stone, int wood, int knowledge, int tile, int point, int stoneConstruct, int woodConstruct, int knowledgeConstruct, int tileConstruct)
      Create a new card machine
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the card
      wood - the wood value the machine require to be created
      stone - the stone value the machine require to be created
      knowledge - the knowledge value the machine require to be created
      tile - the tile value the machine require to be created
      point - the number of point the machine will product
      woodConstruct - the wood value the machine will product
      stoneConstruct - the stone value the machine will product
      knowledgeConstruct - the knowledge value the machine will product
      tileConstruct - the tile value the machine will product
